body:
Spack fails to build vim due to lua errors.

### Expected Result

Builds vim with +lua.

### Actual Result

vim+lua build fails.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack spec vim %gcc@4.8.5
Input spec
--------------------------------
vim%gcc@4.8.5

Concretized
--------------------------------
vim@8.0.1376%gcc@4.8.5~big~cscope~gui+huge+lua~normal+perl+python+ruby~small~tiny~x arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
    ^lua@5.3.4%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
        ^ncurses@6.0%gcc@4.8.5 patches=f84b2708a42777aadcc7f502a261afe10ca5646a51c1ef8b5e60d2070d926b57 ~symlinks arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
            ^pkgconf@1.3.10%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
        ^readline@7.0%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
    ^perl@5.24.1%gcc@4.8.5+cpanm+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
        ^gdbm@1.13%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
    ^python@2.7.14%gcc@4.8.5 patches=123082ab3483ded78e86d7c809e98a804b3465b4683c96bd79a2fd799f572244 +pic+shared~tk~ucs4 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
        ^bzip2@1.0.6%gcc@4.8.5+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
        ^openssl@system%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
        ^sqlite@3.21.0%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
        ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@4.8.5+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
    ^ruby@2.2.0%gcc@4.8.5~openssl~readline arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
        ^libffi@3.2.1%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 

$ spack install --restage vim %gcc@4.8.5
==> Building vim [AutotoolsPackage]                                                                                
==> Executing phase: 'autoreconf'                                                                                 
==> Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    '/lustre/home/rpm/spack/var/spack/stage/vim-8.0.1376-perdsijql45rs2pt3noy26hsim3x7gsp/vim-8.0.1376/configure' '
--prefix=/lustre/spack/tools/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/vim-8.0.1376-perdsijql45rs2pt3noy26hsim3x7gsp' '--enabl
e-fail-if-missing' '--with-tlib=ncursesw' '--with-features=huge' '--enable-pythoninterp=yes' '--enable-rubyinterp=y
es' '--enable-luainterp=yes' '--with-lua-prefix=/lustre/spack/tools/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/lua-5.3.4-u5mfgp
y7twhiaestjpdgvlkk6zt7434c' '--enable-perlinterp=yes' '--enable-gui=no' '--without-x'

1 error found in build log:
     [ ... ]
     60    checking --with-lua-prefix argument... /lustre/spack/tools/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/lua-5.3.4-u5mf
gpy7twhiaestjpdgvlkk6zt7434c
     61    checking --with-luajit... no
     62    checking for lua... /lustre/spack/tools/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/lua-5.3.4-u5mfgpy7twhiaestjpdgvlk
k6zt7434c/bin/lua
     63    checking Lua version... 5.3
     64    checking if lua.h can be found in /lustre/spack/tools/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/lua-5.3.4-u5mfgpy7t
whiaestjpdgvlkk6zt7434c/include... yes
     65    checking if link with -L/lustre/spack/tools/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/lua-5.3.4-u5mfgpy7twhiaestjpd
gvlkk6zt7434c/lib -llua is sane... no
  >> 66    configure: error: could not configure lua

See build log for details:
  /lustre/home/rpm/spack/var/spack/stage/vim-8.0.1376-perdsijql45rs2pt3noy26hsim3x7gsp/vim-8.0.1376/spack-build.out
```
[spack-build.env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/1544826/spack-build.env.txt)
[spack-build.out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/1544827/spack-build.out.txt)


### Information on your system

I am building vim with GCC 4.8.5 shipped with CentOS 7. No configuration has been made in `packages.yaml` regarding vim and lua.
title: Fails to build vim due to lua errors
